# poisdata

A skeleton for Poisson Consulting packages.

## Demonstration

```{r demonstration}
library(poisdata)

x <- 1
is.named(x)
names(x) <- "one"
is.named(x)
```

## Installation

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("poissonconsulting/poisdata")
```
